channel.title: Editing Client text
channel.description:
How would i edit the text in my client so instead of it saying: "Moparscape is loading" it would say "OS scape is loading" or somthing like that
Im building alot of my code but im a n00b at java programing and need help
EDIT: ok i got almost all of it changed now all that is not changing is at the top of the windows name its still saying the old sources client name and i want to change that
